attributes.description:
THIS IS A 308GTS WITH CARBS!!!!!!

1980 FERRARI 308GTS WITH 84000KM'S.
A PERFECTLY MAINTAINED GIALLO FLY YELLOW SPEC 308GTS. ONE OF THE LAST 4 CARBURETOR CARS. 
Ordered with the optional 16'' rims and wrapped in brand new tyres.
Reupholstered original beige interior,
New ignition system including alternator,
Voltage Regulator, coils and leads 
Rebuilt original 4 Carbs 
Rebuilt radiator 
New large electric fans, water hoses and water pump,
Just serviced with cam belt done,
Completely overhauled rear suspension 
Truly meticulously maintained and restored to spec.
Own a piece oh history with this iconic car...
